title: Why is my iPod 160 GB stuck at charging? - Quora

response.answer_text: Same answers as to the same question posed earlier when the device was an iphone, ipad, etc. Bad cable. try swapping it out.Bad charger… ditto.Bad battery, replace the battery. that might take some hunting around. Be warned this is classsified as VERY DIFFICULT by the iFixit folks. Here’s the link. iPod Classic Battery Replacement. I would try the first two first.Defective hardware. time to get a new iPod.If you’re going to take the trouble to revive your old iPod by replacing it’s battery, you might want to replace the hard drive itself while you’re in there as it WILL fail eventually and you might want something that holds more and is faster. How to revive your old iPod Classic with an SSD This article covers replacing both in one go.
